title: Login Issue on Mobile
description: User unable to login via Android app, getting 404 error.

title: Payment Gateway Timeout
description: Transactions are failing during the final processing step.

title: Password Reset Email Not Received
description: Customer requested a password reset but no email arrived.

title: Slow Loading Dashboard
description: The main dashboard takes more than 10 seconds to load.

title: API Documentation Request
description: Partner needs updated API docs for the latest release.

title: Dark Mode Glitch
description: Text is invisible in dark mode on the profile page.

title: Refund Status Query
description: Customer asking about the status of order #5543 refund.

title: Server Downtime Alert
description: US-East server cluster is experiencing intermittent drops.

title: Profile Picture Upload Error
description: JPG files larger than 2MB are being rejected without error message.

title: Feature Request: Export to PDF
description: Users want to export their monthly reports to PDF.

title: Broken Link in Newsletter
description: The link in the weekly newsletter leads to a 404 page.

title: Double Billing Issue
description: Customer was charged twice for the monthly subscription.

title: Search Filter Not Working
description: Filtering by date range returns no results incorrectly.

title: Account Deletion Request
description: User wants to permanently delete their account and data.
